statements: SELECT * FROM authentication_activity
SELECT id, username FROM authentication_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM authentication_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login'
SELECT id, username, timestamp FROM authentication_activity WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM authentication_activity GROUP BY activity_type
SELECT * FROM authentication_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, activity_type FROM authentication_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_activity FROM authentication_activity WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM authentication_activity ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT activity_type) AS unique_activities FROM authentication_activity;
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM authentication_attempts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM authentication_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, user_id FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts WHERE success = true;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type LIKE 'login%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_attempts FROM authentication_attempts GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_attempts > 3;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_activity FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, success FROM authentication_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM authentication_attempts WHERE success = true GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT timestamp, activity_type FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, attempt_timestamp FROM authentication_attempts WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_history WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, SUBSTRING(log_message, 1, 50) AS short_message FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts WHERE success = true;
SELECT user_id, attempt_timestamp FROM authentication_attempts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp, ip_address FROM login_history WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY login_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, success FROM authentication_attempts WHERE success = true;
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(activity_type) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY activity_type;
SELECT u.username, l.login_time FROM users u INNER JOIN login_history l ON u.user_id = l.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) FROM users GROUP BY username;
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.username, login_history.login_time FROM users JOIN login_history ON users.user_id = login_history.user_id;
